description: ICS techniques mitigated by Boot Integrity, ATT&CK mitigation M0946 (v1.0)
name: Boot Integrity (M0946)

techniques.comment: Check the integrity of the existing BIOS or EFI to determine if it is vulnerable to modification. Use Trusted Platform Module technology. (Citation: N/A) Move system's root of trust to hardware to prevent tampering with the SPI flash memory. (Citation: ESET Research Whitepapers September 2018) Technologies such as Intel Boot Guard can assist with this. (Citation: Intel)
